name: DICOM_IMAGE_WINDOW_INFO
description: This table contains the image's window width and center settings.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WINDOW_CENTER
columns.description: This column specifies the window center presets for this image (attribute 0028,1050).

columns.name: WINDOW_WIDTH
columns.description: This column specifies the window width presets for this image (attribute 0028,1051).
